name: selrahcd/burrow-tools
description: Some tools making life easier with evaneos/Burrow

suggest.league/event: Allows to deal with event within your application.
suggest.league/tactician: Allows to deal with command within your application.
suggest.symfony/console: Allows to bootstrap a CLI command.
suggest.remi-san/transaction-manager: Allows to make a consumer transactional using a transaction manager
suggest.broadway/broadway: Allows to use broadway with Burrow.
suggest.remi-san/serializer: Allows to use the universal tactician serializer
